                    cin >> a[i];
                }
                ll overall = 1e18;
                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                    ll moves = 0;
                    ll last = 0;
                    // to the right
                    for (int j = i+1; j < n; j++) {
                        ll need = last / a[j] + 1;
                        moves += need;
                        last = need * a[j];
                    }
                    // to the left
                    last = 0;
                    for (int j = i-1; j >=0; j--) {
                        ll need = last / a[j] + 1;
                        moves += need;
                        last = need * a[j];
                    }
                    overall = min(overall, moves);
                }
                cout << overall << '\n';
            }
